about: I am a computer engineer specialized in Machine Learning and Artificial intelligence,with also a strong background in software development.
I graduated at Polytechnic of Milan in 2021 and in the same period I started working as a Full stack developer at Cisco Systems, where I'm still working.

abilities.title: Machine Learning Engineer
abilities.text: During Master degree I have focused on Machine Learning and AI techniques. I obtained a strong theoretical base and got to challenge myself on various projects in this area.

name: Gabriele Aquaro
